prompts: Create a bipedal Pokemon with green and white colors and an elegant sword-like arm.
Show me a psychic-type Pokemon that has a humanoid shape and a sharp focus in its eyes.
Design a Pokemon that combines agility and elegance, featuring striking green accents.
Generate a fighting-type Pokemon that resembles a knight with a sleek body and a sharp blade.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies determination and grace, with a color palette of green and white.
Make a Pokemon with a unique design that stands out in battles with its powerful stance.
Give me a Pokemon that symbolizes honor and strength, with distinct features like flowing blades.
